title: Rahab and the Spies
summary: Joshua 2 tells how two Israelite spies are hidden by Rahab, a woman in Jericho. She acknowledges Godâ€™s power and asks for protection. The spies promise to spare her and her family if she ties a scarlet cord in her window.

faq.question: Why did Rahab help the spies?
faq.answer: She believed in the Lord and knew He had given the land to Israel.

faq.question: What sign did Rahab use for protection?
faq.answer: A scarlet cord tied in her window.
